nodes.text: Roast greeg pie was an Ugnaught dish. It had a smoky scent, a smell that the Ugnaught Ugloste associated with his being welcomed home when he lived on Cloud City on the planet Bespin.
Roast greeg pie was mentioned in Star Wars Trilogy Sourcebook, Special Edition, a roleplaying supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published in 1995.
